类 LogsClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vechain.thorclient.clients.base.AbstractClient

  • public class LogsClient
extends AbstractClient
    Get log generated by contract with event filter or transfer logs.

    • 方法详细资料

      • filterEvents

        public static java.util.ArrayList<?> filterEvents(EventFilter filter,
                                                  Order order,
                                                  Address address)
                                           throws ClientIOException
        Get events log from a address.
        参数:
        filter - required EventFilter a filter for the events log.
        order - optional ,Order a time order for the events list.
        address - optional, Address a address which has events log.
        返回:
        array of FilteredEvent, could be null. throws ClientIOException network error or request invalid.
        抛出:
        ClientIOException

      • filterTransferLogs

        public static java.util.ArrayList<?> filterTransferLogs(TransferFilter filter,
                                                        Order order)
                                                 throws ClientIOException
        Get transfer logs by order and
        参数:
        filter - required TransferFilter filter.
        order - optional Order the result order.
        返回:
        array of FilteredTransfer could be null.
        抛出:
        ClientIOException - network error
